name: AgroNexus Website Tour
description: AgroNexus is an advanced platform for farmers, agro-scientists, and students to connect, share knowledge, and improve farming practices. This tour will guide you through the website features.

instructions.title: Homepage Overview
instructions.text: Start by visiting the homepage, where you can find the latest market trends, weather updates, and tools suggestions.

instructions.title: AgroTools Section
instructions.text: In the AgroTools section, explore various tools available for booking and detailed specifications.

instructions.title: Profile Setup
instructions.text: Set up your profile to connect with agro-experts and other users.

name: Agro Connect Guide
description: Agro Connect enables farmers to directly interact with agro-scientists for expert advice. This guide will walk you through how to use Agro Connect effectively.

instructions.title: Search for Experts
instructions.text: Use the search bar to find agro-scientists in your area or field of interest.

instructions.title: Connect via Chat
instructions.text: Send a message or book a consultation through the chat feature.

instructions.title: Make a Video Call
instructions.text: Start a video call to discuss complex issues face-to-face.

name: Agro Market Tutorial
description: This tutorial shows how farmers can sell and buy products on the Agro Market, allowing them to get the best prices.

instructions.title: Listing a Product
instructions.text: Add your product by providing details like name, price, and quantity.

instructions.title: Browsing Market
instructions.text: Explore the market to find the best deals on agricultural products.

instructions.title: Make a Purchase
instructions.text: Click on 'Buy Now' to purchase a product directly from a farmer.

name: Weather Dashboard Walkthrough
description: Stay updated with real-time weather forecasts. This walkthrough helps you navigate the weather dashboard effectively.

instructions.title: Access the Weather Dashboard
instructions.text: Find the weather dashboard on the homepage to view current conditions.

instructions.title: Set Location Alerts
instructions.text: Set your location to receive weather alerts specific to your region.

instructions.title: Check Forecasts
instructions.text: View weekly and monthly forecasts to plan farming activities.

name: Profile Customization Guide
description: Learn how to personalize your AgroNexus profile for better connections and networking.

instructions.title: Edit Profile
instructions.text: Go to the profile section to update your personal information.

instructions.title: Set Preferences
instructions.text: Choose your interests and preferences to receive customized suggestions.

instructions.title: Upload Profile Picture
instructions.text: Upload a clear picture to improve your visibility among peers.

name: Notifications Setup
description: This guide helps you set up notifications to stay informed about important updates, market trends, and expert advice.

instructions.title: Enable Notifications
instructions.text: Go to the settings page and toggle on notifications for alerts.

instructions.title: Choose Notification Types
instructions.text: Select which types of notifications you wish to receive: weather, market updates, or messages from experts.

instructions.title: Set Delivery Preferences
instructions.text: Choose how you'd like to receive notifications: via email, SMS, or in-app alerts.

name: Booking Agro Tools Guide
description: This guide will show you how to book agricultural tools for your farm directly through the platform.

instructions.title: Browse Tools
instructions.text: Explore the wide range of tools available for rental or purchase.

instructions.title: View Tool Details
instructions.text: Click on a tool to see its specifications, user reviews, and availability.

instructions.title: Book a Tool
instructions.text: Select the rental duration and confirm your booking.

name: Help & Support Guide
description: This guide explains how to contact support, resolve issues, and access our help resources.

instructions.title: Access Help Center
instructions.text: Navigate to the 'Help & Support' section from the homepage footer.

instructions.title: Submit a Query
instructions.text: Fill out the query form with your question or issue.

instructions.title: Contact Support
instructions.text: Use the chat or call option to get in touch with our customer support team.

name: LinkedIn for Farmers Tutorial
description: This tutorial shows how farmers can use the LinkedIn-like feature to connect, post, and engage with the community.

instructions.title: Create a Post
instructions.text: Share your experiences, ask questions, or post updates to engage with the community.

instructions.title: Tag and Categorize
instructions.text: Tag your posts for better visibility and categorize them under relevant topics.

instructions.title: Comment and Like
instructions.text: Engage with other farmers and experts by commenting on or liking their posts.

name: Farm Reels Walkthrough
description: Farm Reels allows farmers to create and share short videos about their practices. This walkthrough will guide you through creating and viewing reels.

instructions.title: Create a Reel
instructions.text: Record a short video showcasing your farming techniques or innovations.

instructions.title: Edit and Upload
instructions.text: Edit your reel by adding text or filters, and then upload it to the platform.

instructions.title: View Popular Reels
instructions.text: Browse trending farm reels to get inspired by other farmers' practices.
